comment._content: 1843 - 1922. Lawyer, politician, judge. Chief Judge New York Court of Appeals 1904 - 1913 en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edgar_M._Cullen

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
BobMeade,

Thanks for the information on Mr. Cullen! We will add to the photo description when we update.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: In 1913, Judge Cullen presided at the impeachment of New York Governor William Sulzer, and voted against conviction. He retired at the end of the year, having reached the mandatory retirement age of 70.
